Type.Name: ButtonBoxStyle

TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed ButtonBoxStyle extends System.Enum

Type.ThreadSafetyStatement: Gtk# is thread aware, but not thread safe; See the Gtk# Thread Programming for details.

Docs.summary: Used to dictate the style that a uses to layout the buttons it contains. (See also: and ).

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Gtk.ButtonBoxStyle Center = int32(5)
.field public static literal valuetype Gtk.ButtonBoxStyle Edge = int32(2)

Docs.summary: Buttons are placed at the edges of the ButtonBox.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Gtk.ButtonBoxStyle End = int32(4)

Docs.summary: Buttons are grouped towards the end of a box, (on the right for a , or the bottom for a ).

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Gtk.ButtonBoxStyle Spread = int32(1)

Docs.summary: Buttons are evenly spread across the ButtonBox.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Gtk.ButtonBoxStyle Start = int32(3)

Docs.summary: Buttons are grouped towards the start of box, (on the left for a , or the top for a ).
